name: The Arrogant Ant-Man Quiz | Marvel Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which organization did O'Grady work for prior to becoming Ant-Man?
questions.explanation:
S.H.I.E.L.D.

	Eric O'Grady was a low-level operative for S.H.I.E.L.D. before he became Ant-Man. He took Pym's redesigned Ant-Man suit for himself, having found the technology that was in S.H.I.E.L.D.'s possession.

questions.text: In which year did O'Grady appear?
questions.explanation:
2006.

	O'Grady appeared in the first issue of "Civil War: Choosing Sides" in December 2006. Later that month, he got his own series, "The Irredeemable Ant-Man".

Chris McCarthy.

	McCarthy was the first person to wear the new Ant-Man suit, but he was soon killed by HYDRA agents. Ever the loyal friend, O'Grady wasted no time in making out with McCarthy's girlfriend on top of his late friend's grave.

questions.text: Mitch Carson is appointed to find the missing Ant-Man technology.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Carson, another S.H.I.E.L.D. agent whom O'Grady looks up to, is assigned to find the missing Ant-Man suit and bring O'Grady to justice.

questions.text: In the first issue of "The Irredeemable Ant-Man", whom had Eric been seeing?
questions.explanation:
Kirsten.

	Eric had been romantically seeing Kirsten, both of them agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. However, things were broken off between them two weeks before the issue.

questions.text: In his hunt for O'Grady, Mitch Carson sports a facial deformity.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Severe burns cover the right half of Carson's face, giving him a Red-Skull-esque appearance. It is for this reason that Carson only has one working eye and burns with vengeance, no pun intended.

questions.text: According to O'Grady, whom had McCarthy been cheating on Veronica with?
questions.explanation:
Kirsten.

	This was a lie concocted by O'Grady simply because he wanted Veronica to himself. McCarthy was missing at the time, unable to defend himself against the accusations.

questions.text: While in his miniscule size, what body part of O'Grady's does McCarthy promise to injure?
questions.explanation:
His brain.

	For lying to Veronica, McCarthy vows to kick O'Grady in the brain. However, McCarthy is killed by HYDRA agents before he can do so.

questions.text: Which super-villain is not shown on the cover of the first issue of "The Irredeemable Ant-Man"?
questions.explanation:
Magneto.

	Ant-Man is shown standing on top of a heap of defeated villains, exclaiming "Twelve villains and not a single wallet?"

questions.text: In return for saving a woman from a robber, what does Ant-Man ask for?
options: He wants the woman to help him find a lost dog
questions.explanation:
Dinner.

	O'Grady, in the Ant-Man suit, saves a lady from a robber who was also a potential rapist. In return, he asks the lady out to dinner, only to claim that he has no money. He later gives ten dollars to the taxi driver, leaving his date confused.
